org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.camera

Class CameraUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.camera.CameraUtils

  • public class CameraUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of useful functions for the camera.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini
    See Also:
    https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/media/camera

        public CameraUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • checkCameraHardware

        public static boolean checkCameraHardware(android.content.Context context)
        Check if this device has a camera.
        Returns:
        true if the device has a camera, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/media/camera

      • getCameraInstance

        @Nullable
public static android.hardware.Camera getCameraInstance()
        Gets an instance of the Camera object.
        Returns:
        the camera if Camera.open() was successful, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/media/camera

      • setCameraDisplayOrientation

        public static void setCameraDisplayOrientation(android.app.Activity activity,
                                               int cameraId,
                                               android.hardware.Camera camera)
        Sets the orientation of the picture taken by the camera to the one of the display. Without a call to this method, the picture could be shown rotated in portrait mode.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity showing the preview.
        cameraId - the id of the camera .
        camera - the camera instance.

      • getExifTransformation

        private static android.graphics.Matrix getExifTransformation(int orientation,
                                                             int width,
                                                             int height)
        Calculates the correct transformation matrix for the given exif orientation flag.
        Parameters:
        orientation - exif orientation flag.
        width - image width.
        height - image height.
        Returns:
        the matrix transformation to apply to the image.
        See Also:
        https://stackoverflow.com/a/6010475

      • byteArray2Bitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap byteArray2Bitmap(byte[] bytes)
        Converts the image as a byte array to a Bitmap.
        See Also:
        BitmapFactory.decodeByteArray(byte[], int, int)

      • getExifOrientation

        public static int getExifOrientation(byte[] bytes)
        Returns the Exif orientation flag in the image.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the image as a byte array.
        Returns:
        the Exif orientation flag if found, ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_NORMAL otherwise.

      • getCorrectRotationBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getCorrectRotationBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap sourceBitmap,
                                                               int orientation)
        Rotates the image depending on the source orientation.
        Parameters:
        sourceBitmap - the source image.
        orientation - the Exif orientation flag.
        Returns:
        the rotated image.
